meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Sieja Amanda Rosner Sam Deutsch Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7228.

td.p: Michael Sieja, a sophomore at Mississippi State University from Huntsville, Alabama
Amanda Rosner, a freshman at Northwestern University from Sandy Springs, Georgia
Sam Deutsch, a junior at the University of Southern California from Bethesda, Maryland

tr.td: HAIL TO THE CHIEF
PREFIX IT FOR ME
DOGGING IT
TV FAMILY RELATIONSHIPS
GOING UNDERWATER
I NEED A SUB
